thread.title: Mitsubishi recalls 86,620 Outlander cars in Russia: watchdog

title: Mitsubishi recalls 86,620 Outlander cars in Russia: watchdog
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s standards agency Rosstandart said on Friday it has been informed about the recall of 86,620 Mitsubishi Motors Corp ( 7211.T ) Outlander cars sold in Russia from February 2007 to June 2012.
FILE PHOTO: The logo of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. is pictured at the 45th Tokyo Motor Show in Tokyo, Japan October 25, 2017. REUTERS/Toru Hanai/File Photo The Japanese automaker is recalling the vehicles to replace front airbags on the driver’s side, Rosstandart said in a statement on its website.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova
